title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Tools
body: Chumash:  Tools       Flint Knapping uses hand tools similar to the ones we use today, but you might be surpised by what the tools are made from.  The Tomol was an important form of transporation for the Chumash. Where do you think it took them. Find out below.        CLOSE THIS WINDOW and Return to Cultural Journey Start this activity again.               Chumash Flint Knapping(object placeholder)      CLOSE THIS WINDOW and Return to Cultural Journey Start this activity again.       The Chumash Tomol(object placeholder)
